features: 🔸Product - The perfect alternative to permanent dyes is Leganza hair coloring balm, which has a new semi-permanent dye system developed with a unique and creamy formula with 7 pure 100% natural oils.

🧴 Formula - Its composition includes natural oils of argan, macadamia, avocado, shea butter, jojoba, olive and almond. These components have all the conditions and characteristics to take care of your hair, in addition to bringing the color pigments directly to the hair structure, guaranteeing good color saturation and magnificent shine.

✨ Function - This natural hair balm is ideal for full hair dyeing, for highlights, for color maintenance between dye applications, or for anyone who wants to dye their hair while avoiding compounds with ammonia or other harmful substances.

💜 Hair care - Ammonia free, paraben free, PPD free, and hydrogen peroxide free, its natural formula is designed for hair care. In addition, it's great ability to cover gray hair (70-80%) and ease of use make it ideal for beginners in hair coloring.

🎨 How to use - Put on gloves and a protective layer. Apply evenly to clean (pre-shampooed) and damp hair. The usage time can be determined from the table included in the product photos. After dyeing, wash thoroughly with water (and shampoo), until it is transparent.
description: Product Description Leganza Hair Coloring Balm Color Copper Titian Nº 40 The perfect alternative to permanent dyes! This natural hair balm is ideal for achieving a complete hair dye, for achieving highlights, for color maintenance between dye applications, or for anyone who wants to dye their hair while avoiding chemical compounds such as ammonia or other harmful substances. Previous page They ensure better color saturation With natural argan, macadamia, avocado, shea butter, jojoba, olive and almond oils. 16 different shades Leganza coloring balms offer a wide variety of colors. Ideal for people with allergies to dyes No ammonia, no parabens, no PPD, and no hydrogen peroxide. Next page 1 Natural Ingredients 2 Variety of colors 3 Take care of your hair How is this natural coloring balm different from other hair dyes? Our coloring balm does not contain ammonia, parabens, PPD or hydrogen peroxide. What natural ingredients does this product contain and how do they benefit my hair? Its unique formula with natural argan, macadamia, avocado, shea butter, jojoba, olive and almond oils help the color pigment adhere better to the hair fiber while nourishing and caring for the hair. How long does the color last after applying the balm? Between 6-8 washes, depending on the hair. How many applications can I get from a 150ml bottle? Depending on the length of the hair. For example, for medium length hair, it could be used for 2 applications. Does it help to lighten hair? It cannot lighten hair color since it does not contain peroxide. For example, in the case of blonde tones, it acts as a toner. Complete your daily care routine!
